languages.text: {n}Женщина резко вскидывает голову и упирается в вас безумным взглядом. Только сейчас вы замечаете красно-черное клеймо на ее щеке в виде многолучевой звезды — символ Хаоса. Пленница обнажает зубы — не то в качестве угрозы, не то от страха.{/n}

{n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина резко вскидывает голову и упирается в вас безумным взглядом. Только сейчас вы замечаете красно-черное клеймо на ее щеке в виде многолучевой звезды — символ Хаоса. Пленница обнажает зубы — не то в качестве угрозы, не то от страха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a red and black marking on her cheek shaped like a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

{n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a red and black marking on her cheek shaped like a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

{n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

{n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

{n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个女人的头抽搐着，以谵妄的目光盯着你。直到这个时候，你才留意到她的脸颊上画着一个红黑相间的印记。那是个多角星，是混沌的象征。这个囚犯对你露出了牙齿，但你不知道她这么做是为了威胁你，还是仅仅是出于恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个女人的头抽搐着，以谵妄的目光盯着你。直到这个时候，你才留意到她的脸颊上画着一个红黑相间的印记。那是个多角星，是混沌的象征。这个囚犯对你露出了牙齿，但你不知道她这么做是为了威胁你，还是仅仅是出于恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mujer ladea bruscamente la cabeza y te mira, delirante. Solo ahora ves la marca de color negro rojizo en su mejilla. Es una estrella de muchas puntas, símbolo del Caos. La prisionera te enseña los dientes, pero no sabes si es para amenazarte o por miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer ladea bruscamente la cabeza y te mira, delirante. Solo ahora ves la marca de color negro rojizo en su mejilla. Es una estrella de muchas puntas, símbolo del Caos. La prisionera te enseña los dientes, pero no sabes si es para amenazarte o por miedo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}女は頭を振る。その錯乱した表情に動けなくなる。そのとき初めて、女の頬に赤黒い印があることに気づく…たくさんの細長いものが生えた星、渾沌のシンボルだ。囚人は歯を剥き出しにしているが、それが威嚇なのか、単に恐怖心からなのかはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}女は頭を振る。その錯乱した表情に動けなくなる。そのとき初めて、女の頬に赤黒い印があることに気づく…たくさんの細長いものが生えた星、渾沌のシンボルだ。囚人は歯を剥き出しにしているが、それが威嚇なのか、単に恐怖心からなのかはわからない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Frau legt den Kopf schief und fixiert dich mit einem wahnhaften Blick. Erst jetzt bemerkst du ein rotschwarzes Mal auf ihrer Wange – ein vielzackiger Stern, ein Symbol des Chaos. Die Gefangene entblößt ihre Zähne, aber du kannst nicht sagen, ob sie dich bedroht oder nur Angst hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau legt den Kopf schief und fixiert dich mit einem wahnhaften Blick. Erst jetzt bemerkst du ein rotschwarzes Mal auf ihrer Wange – ein vielzackiger Stern, ein Symbol des Chaos. Die Gefangene entblößt ihre Zähne, aber du kannst nicht sagen, ob sie dich bedroht oder nur Angst hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La femme tourne brusquement la tête vers vous et vous fixe d'un regard fiévreux. Ce n'est qu'à ce moment-là que vous remarquez une marque d'un noir rougeâtre sur sa joue : une étoile à multiples branches rouge, symbole du Chaos. La prisonnière découvre les dents, mais vous ne sauriez dire s'il s'agit là d'une menace ou d'une simple manifestation de peur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme tourne brusquement la tête vers vous et vous fixe d'un regard fiévreux. Ce n'est qu'à ce moment-là que vous remarquez une marque d'un noir rougeâtre sur sa joue : une étoile à multiples branches rouge, symbole du Chaos. La prisonnière découvre les dents, mais vous ne sauriez dire s'il s'agit là d'une menace ou d'une simple manifestation de peur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadın kafasını aniden kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Bakışlarında, kuduz köpeği andıran bir hasımlık var. Yanağında kırmızıya çalan siyah bir sembol olduğunu yeni fark ediyorsun. Bu sembol, çok köşeli bir yıldız. Kaos'un sembolü. Mahkûm dişlerini gösteriyor ancak tehditkârlığından mı yoksa ürktüğünden mi, çözemiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman jerks her head and transfixes you with a delirious gaze. Only now do you notice a reddish black mark on her cheek — a many-pointed star, a symbol of Chaos. The prisoner bares her teeth, but you cannot tell whether she does so as a threat or simply out of fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın kafasını aniden kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Bakışlarında, kuduz köpeği andıran bir hasımlık var. Yanağında kırmızıya çalan siyah bir sembol olduğunu yeni fark ediyorsun. Kaos sembolü olan, çok köşeli bir yıldız sembolü bu. Mahkûm dişlerini gösteriyor ancak tehditkâr mı yoksa ürktüğü için mi çözemiyorsun.{/n}
